long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Deltaturn Browser Extension: Effortlessly Add Real Estate Listings to Deltaturn.com

This Chrome extension simplifies adding property listings from real estate websites like Zillow or Streeteasy directly to your Deltaturn account.  Once installed, the extension integrates with these websites, adding an "Add to Deltaturn" button next to listings. Clicking this button automatically transfers the listing details to your Deltaturn account, saving you time and effort.

Here's how it works:

- Install the Deltaturn Browser Extension from the Chrome Web Store.
- Log in to your Deltaturn account when prompted by the extension.
- Browse real estate websites like Zillow or Streeteasy.
- When you find a listing you're interested in, look for the "Add to Deltaturn" button next to it.
- Click the button to automatically add the listing details to your Deltaturn account.
Important Note:

The Deltaturn Browser Extension currently focuses on adding listing details.  It will automate contacting listing agents directly and will keep the property information readily available in Deltaturn, you can easily reach out to them for further details.
